item.title: WPPConnect patch release: v1.19.1
item.description: Today we are releasing a patch version v1.19.1 for WPPConnect with Bug Fixes and Features.
item.content:encoded:
Today we are releasing a patch version v1.19.1 for WPPConnect with Bug Fixes and Features.

Bug Fixes​

  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-js to ^2.15.1 (8da5082)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-js to ^2.15.2 (c18c547)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.185 (926f440)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.187 (27dcf14)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.190 (f819bc8)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.197 (641ff35)
  • Fixed onMessage method (fix #1351) (e8549a1)
  • Fixed qrCode loading (fix #1422) (9b66878)
  • Removed unused modules (#1422) (965be01)

Features​

  • Added client.editBusinessProfile and client.getBusinessProfile (bb7390e)

For more information, see the release page.

item.title: WA-JS minor release: v2.15.0
item.description: Today we are releasing minor version v2.15.0 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes and Features.
item.content:encoded:
Today we are releasing minor version v2.15.0 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes and Features.

Bug Fixes​

  • Fixed export of ParticipantCollection (95787bc)
  • Fixed msg id on change:ack event for groups (1170848)
  • Fixed WPP.chat.sendFileMessage for animated stickers (fix #432) (6c69da7)

Features​

  • Added WPP.chat.forwardMessage function (#603) (afe5ac3)
  • Added WPP.chat.getMessageACK function (close #697) (ffc378f)
  • Exported MsgInfoParticipantCollection and MsgInfoParticipantModel (35011b4)

For more information, see the release page.

item.title: WPPConnect minor release: v1.17.0
item.description: Today we are releasing minor version v1.17.0 for WPPConnect with Bug Fixes and Features.
item.content:encoded:
Today we are releasing minor version v1.17.0 for WPPConnect with Bug Fixes and Features.

Bug Fixes​

  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-js to ^2.11.0 (43ae2c6)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-js to ^2.11.1 (8c5de17)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-js to ^2.12.0 (#1333) (fix #1330) (ecda056)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.126 (#1269) (fa954fc)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.128 (c853397)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.131 (f3588f7)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.133 (0a04393)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.135 (a9376cc)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.143 (3138b36)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.145 (1426644)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.150 (7c4ff9e)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.154 (#1334) (daa94ef)
  • Fixed setOnlinePresence method (1ae2658)
  • Updated WhatsApp WEB version to 2.2234.x (3edc013)

Features​

  • Added client.getLabelById function (fix #278) (5ecfcb6)
  • Added client.getPlatformFromMessage function (756775e)
  • Added client.markPlayed function (fix #706) (72a70f3)
  • Added client.sendReadStatus function (#673) (f0361b9)
  • Added functions to get, edit, delete products and collections of catalog (fix #363, fix #905) (bbcdfa9)

For more information, see the release page.

item.title: WA-JS minor release: v2.12.0
item.description: Today we are releasing minor version v2.12.0 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes and Features.
item.content:encoded:
Today we are releasing minor version v2.12.0 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes and Features.

Features​

For more information, see the release page.

item.title: WA-JS minor release: v2.11.0
item.description: Today we are releasing minor version v2.11.0 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes and Features.
item.content:encoded:
Today we are releasing minor version v2.11.0 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes and Features.

Bug Fixes​

  • Added support for reply status stories (#594) (19b2729)
  • Update minimum require Whatsapp version to >= 2.2212.4-beta (bcb5f36)

Features​

  • Added create, edit, and delete products functions (fix #442) (8e8bb22)
  • Added get, create, edit, and delete collections functions (fix #442) (ef6192b)
  • Added option to get only media, url and docs for WPP.chat.getMessages (a74ac3c)
  • Added WPP.catalog.getProductById function (0b883a3)
  • Added WPP.catalog.getProducts function (f4d1716)
  • Added WPP.catalog.setProductVisibility function (d3a60e3)
  • Added WPP.catalog.updateCartEnabled function (b70af87)
  • Added WPP.chat.canMarkPlayed function (4149eec)
  • Added WPP.chat.getPlatformFromMessage function (d0f41ee)
  • Added WPP.chat.markPlayed function (c21941f)
  • Added WPP.contact.getBusinessProfile function (5c8e57a)
  • Added WPP.labels.getLabelById function (56767b4)
  • Added WPP.profile.editBusinessProfile function (30f18b2)
  • Added WPP.status.sendReadStatus (a4587dc)
  • Exported calculateFilehashFromBlob from WhatsApp (c0c0772)
  • Exported ProductCatalogSession from WhatsApp (0aefe4c)

For more information, see the release page.

item.title: WA-JS minor release: v2.9.0
item.description: Today we are releasing minor version v2.9.0 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes and Features.
item.content:encoded:
Today we are releasing minor version v2.9.0 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes and Features.

Bug Fixes​

  • Avoid duplicate self account for send status (a7eef5b)
  • Fixed status/stores screen after send (3fb61bd)
  • Fixed WPP.chat.sendLocationMessage function (wppconnect-team/wppconnect#1237) (23b8cf3)
  • Improved message key for status/stories (87d28bf)
  • Removed offline link-preview server (1d10bab)

Features​

  • Added group.participant_changed event (e24dcc2)
  • Added WPP.chat.getLastSeen function (#546) (925920d)
  • Improved link-preview to try all available servers (f728bcb)

For more information, see the release page.

item.title: WPP Server minor release: v1.6.0
item.description: Today we are releasing minor version v1.6.0 for WPP Server with Bug Fixes and Features.
item.content:encoded:
Today we are releasing minor version v1.6.0 for WPP Server with Bug Fixes and Features.

Features​

  • Added routes to manage labels (25f21c0)

For more information, see the release page.

item.title: WA-JS patch release: v2.8.2
item.description: Today we are releasing a patch version v2.8.2 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes.
item.content:encoded:
Today we are releasing a patch version v2.8.2 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes.

Bug Fixes​

item.title: WPPConnect patch release: v1.14.5
item.description: Today we are releasing a patch version v1.14.5 for WPPConnect with Bug Fixes and Features.
item.content:encoded:
Today we are releasing a patch version v1.14.5 for WPPConnect with Bug Fixes and Features.

Bug Fixes​

  • Adding Missing Typing in GroupMetadata (30f1caa)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.104 (3e0a33d)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.98 (e342c41)
  • Fixed getAllGroups method (fix #1089, fix #1188) (4efb0cf)
  • Improved onAnyMessage for ciphertext messages (7eb9e59)
  • Improved onMessage event to re-trigger message after ciphertext (fix #1065) (b9ff808)
  • Improved onPresenceChanged event (d71835f)
  • typings: Adding Missing Typing in Chat (a6afdd1)
  • Updated @wppconnect/wa-js to v2.8.1 (fix #1196) (8ecaa6b)

Features​

  • Added poweredBy config for Google Analytics (b0883f3)
  • options for GA and linkPreviewApiServers (#1186) (4479f9b)

For more information, see the release page.

item.title: WA-JS patch release: v2.8.1
item.description: Today we are releasing a patch version v2.8.1 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes and Features.
item.content:encoded:
Today we are releasing a patch version v2.8.1 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes and Features.

Bug Fixes​

  • Fixed chat.live_location_update event when there are a current shared location (085a719)
  • Fixed chat.msg_ack_change event to ignore non my messages (78e5d49)
  • Fixed WPP.chat.markIsUnread function (wppconnect-team/wppconnect#1196) (db7195e)
  • Improved chat.presence_change event to use queueMicrotask (34dd0d6)
  • Update status v3 contacts before send (96fa79b)
  • Use non obstructive trigger for chat.new_message event (07316fb)

Features​

  • Trigger chat.new_message event for ciphertext msg after sync (3338cce)

For more information, see the release page.

Features​

item.title: WA-JS patch release: v2.7.1
item.description: Today we are releasing a patch version v2.7.1 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes, Features and BREAKING CHANGES.
item.content:encoded:
Today we are releasing a patch version v2.7.1 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes, Features and BREAKING CHANGES.

Bug Fixes​

  • Fixed compatibility with WhatsApp Web >= 2.2222.8 (a1d994c)
  • Return undefined instead of throw an exception (817592b)

Features​

  • Added Google Analytics (946cc80)
  • Added WPP.call.rejectCall function (4461cb0)
  • Added WPP.catalog.getMyCatalog function (7922931)
  • Aded call.incoming_call event (e318902)

BREAKING CHANGES​

  • Now "not found module" will return undefined value instead of throw an exception

For more information, see the release page.

item.content:encoded:
Today we are releasing minor version v1.14.0 for WPPConnect with Bug Fixes, Features and BREAKING CHANGES.

Bug Fixes​

  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-js to ^2.6.0 (27d5a52)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.89 (d65437d)
  • Fixed compatibility with WhatsApp WEB >= 2.2220.8 (1a96ab1)
  • Updated the WhatsApp version to 2.2220.X (8ad94be)
  • Updated User-Agend (2353013)

Features​

  • Automatic use tokens folder for browser session (f082612)
  • Full rework of sendFile to allow options (b1b712e)
  • Full rework of sendLocation to allow options (d9fb419)

BREAKING CHANGES​

  • Changed the sendLocation result
  • Changed the function result

For more information, see the release page.
